name: Zelda-like FREE
description:
Zelda-like FREE

You can use the arrow keys to move around the world above before deciding whether or not you want to download the .capx file. Only the latest version of Construct2 free edition is required to run the .capx. This file shows you:

  • How to create top down Zelda-like player movement
  • How to enter and exit an area
  • How to create enemy or NPC movement
.Capx download below

Please feel free to download and share the .capx file below, and then use it to get started on your own top down Zelda-like game. Design the sprite art, decide how enemies should be killed, create new areas, and make something all your own.

If you like this .capx, you can download my platformer .capx here.
